{{html:
<div id="headerwrap">
			<div class="container">
				<div class="row">
				
				<div class="span6 hidden-tablet">
	    				<!-- Slider -->
	          			<div id="myCarousel" class="carousel slide hidden-phone">
						<ol class="carousel-indicators">
							<li data-target="#myCarousel" data-slide-to="0" class="active"></li>
							<li data-target="#myCarousel" data-slide-to="1"></li>
							<li data-target="#myCarousel" data-slide-to="2"></li>
							<li data-target="#myCarousel" data-slide-to="3"></li>
							<li data-target="#myCarousel" data-slide-to="4"></li>
						</ol>
	           				<div class="carousel-inner">
	              			    <!-- First Image -->
	              				<div class="item active">
	                				<h1>Saudi Cloud<br>
الحوسبة السحابية السعودية</h1>
							<p class="hidden-phone hidden-tablet"> Welcome to Saudi Cloud, the home to the vision of taking IT to the next level.<br>
							
							 Saudi Cloud is a brand of Dacentec KSA, an international corporation delivering cloud solutions to Telcos and SAAS providers.<br>
							</p>
	              				</div>
	              			    
	              				<div class="item">
	                				<h1>Change the IT Mindset</h1>
							<p class="hidden-phone hidden-tablet"> Saudi Cloud sees a need to perceive IT in another way, a mind change in how companies are dealing with IT today. IT has become the most important element next to electricity and oil in our economy.<br>
							
							 However, IT has become for many a hurdle and sometimes even a threat, since IT has become too complex to use and to understand.<br>
							
							  </p>
							
							
	              				</div>
								<div class="item">
	                				<h1>Make IT as Energy</h1>
							<p class="hidden-phone hidden-tablet"> What if we could use Green IT just like electricity, where we can consume it by the unit and pay for what we use.<br>
							
							 The Saudi Cloud cloud is ready to be deployed in Telco context in emerging markets TODAY.<br>
							
							 </p>
							
							
	              				</div>
								<div class="item">
	                				<h1>Enabling the Telco Cloud</h1>
							<p class="hidden-phone hidden-tablet"> Saudi Cloud enables telcos and service providers to compete in the cloud, bringing them the same reliability as big public clouds, better cost effectiveness, hybrid public/private cloud and cloud desktop integration.br>
							
							 The Saudi Cloud cloud is ready to be deployed in Telco context in emerging markets TODAY.<br>
							
							 </p>
							
							
	              				</div>
								<div class="item">
	                				<h1>Cloud Know How</h1>
							<p class="hidden-phone hidden-tablet"> Our highly experienced team delivered major projects in high end hosting and datacenters in the last 15 years.<br>
							
							 This allows us to span a much broader delivery than typically is the case.<br>
							
							</p>
							
							
	              				</div>
	            			</div>
	          			</div><!-- /myCarousel -->
	    				<!-- /END Slider -->
					</div><!-- /span6 -->
				
					<div class="span6 videoBg">
						<iframe width="450" height="300" src="http://s.zntr.cc/scripts/iframe.htm?playerid=5oUD2OMC0ku6Rhgp82pSsA&amp;wmode=transparent" frameborder="0" webkitallowfullscreen="" allowfullscreen=""></iframe>
					</div><!-- /span6 -->
					
					
				</div><!-- /row -->
			</div><!-- /container -->
		</div><!-- /headerwrap -->
